about.title: About me
about.subtitle: My name is Raimundo, António Raimundo 😎
about.desc1: I hold a PhD in Information Science and Technology from Iscte - University Institute of Lisbon, Portugal, and currently serve as an Assistant Professor at the School of Applied Digital Technologies at Iscte-Sintra. I am proud to play a pivotal role as Director of the Bachelor's degree program in Digital Technologies and Artificial Intelligence.
about.desc2: My research focuses on Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Large Language Models, Computer Vision, and Data Science, areas where I actively contribute as an Integrated Researcher at Istar_Iscte. Alongside my academic pursuits, I bring my expertise to impactful industry and public sector projects. As a board member of ISCTE Meta Digital, I contribute to integrating digital innovation into strategic planning. Additionally, I am involved in the AI4PA project, where I leverage Artificial Intelligence technologies to enhance public administration efficiencies and services.
about.desc3: Beyond teaching and research, I actively participate in various educational initiatives, including lecturing in UPskill courses, and providing training across diverse formats, from short courses to postgraduate programs. I have also been a featured speaker at numerous business events, sharing insights into the intersection of technology, innovation, and society. My {projectLink} page highlights some of my key works.
about.desc4: If you are a prospective MSc or PhD student looking for opportunities to work on cutting-edge topics under my supervision, or if you are simply curious about my work, {contactMe}. I’m always excited to collaborate and explore new possibilities.
